# Plot

Descriptive text.

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=8}

litterboom_counts |> 
  group_by(category, location) |> 
  summarise(count = sum(count)) |> 
  
  ggplot(aes(x = category,
             y = count,
             fill = category)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~location) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw(base_size = 14) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid = element_blank()) 


```

The following Graph is showing the distribution of the different plastic and waste types for the sampling time (September 19th 2022 - Oktober 17th 2022) in kg.

```{r stacked area chart}
plastic_types |> 
  # filter for Beachwood Mangrove
  filter(place == "Beachwood Mangrove") |> 
  rename(footwear = shoes) |>
  # select variables including weight in kg (excluding shoes)
  # pivot longer to create a stacked area plot
  pivot_longer(cols = c(pet:pp, ps:glass), names_to = "group", values_to = "value") |> 
  # fix NA values
  replace_na(list(value = 0)) |>
  # plot stacked area chart
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x=date, y=value, fill=group)) + 
  geom_area(alpha=0.6 , size=0.6, colour="white") +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(name = "Waste type",
                       labels = c("Footwear", "Glass", "Other Plastics", "Other Waste",
                                  "PE", "PET", "PP", "PS")) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of the different waste types (in kg) at the Beachwood Mangrove.",
       x = "Date of sampling in 2022",
       y = "Weight (kg)") +
  theme_bw()
```  

# Prepare a map

```{r}
leaflet(locations)  |>
  setView(lng = locations$longitude[[4]],
          lat = locations$latitude[[4]],
          zoom = 13) |>
  addTiles() |>
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = ~longitude,
    lat = ~latitude,
    label = ~location,
    radius = 10,
    stroke = FALSE,
    fillOpacity = 1,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = T,
                                textsize = "10px",
                                direction = "left",
                                offset = c(0, 0),
                                style = list(
                                  "box-shadow" = "3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)",
                                  "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)",
                                  "font-style" = "italic"
                                )))

```
